T04bsa040_u:0: Cittotpādasaṃvaravidhikramaḥ namo mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sarvadurgatito hīnaṃ sarvāvaraṇavarjitam
T04bsa040_u:5: kalyāṇamitre śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādya evam adhyeṣitavyam- yathā
T04bsa040_u:6: pūrvatathāgatārhat-samyaksambuddhaiḥ mahābhūmisthitabodhisattvaiśca pūrvam anuttarasamyaksambodhau cittotpādaḥ kṛtaḥ tathā evaṃ nāmno mamāpi ācāryo 'nuttarasamyaksambodhau cittam utpādayed iti triḥ vadet /
T04bsa040_u:8: ahamevaṃnāmā etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ dvipadānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi /
T04bsa040_u:10: ahamevaṃnāmā etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ dharmāṇāmuttamaṃ śāntavirāgaṃ dharma śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi /
T04bsa040_u:12: ahamevaṃnāmā etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ gaṇānāmuttamaṃ āryabodhisattvāvaivartikabodhisattvasaṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi iti triḥ vadet /
T04bsa040_u:13: evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ śaraṇagamanaṃ kṛttvā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ, daśadiśāṃ sarvabuddhān bodhisattvāṃśca manasā ālambya praṇamanaṃ yathālabdhaṃ pūjādikaṃ ca kuryāt /
T04bsa040_u:14: ācāryam sammukhaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya utkuṭukāsano 'pi vā kṛtāñjaliḥ cittam utpādayet /
T04bsa040_u:18: ahamevaṃnāmā- asyāṃ jātāvanyāsu vā jātiṣvanavarāgre vā dāna-śīla-bhāvanāyaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ syāt kāritaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ vā anumoditaṃ bhavet taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ yathā pūrvakaiḥ tathāgatārhatsamyaksambuddhaiḥ mahābhūmipraviṣṭaiḥ mahābodhisattvaiśca anuttarasaṃyaksambodhau cittamutpāditaṃ tathā evaṃnāmā ahamapi
T04bsa040_u:25: tathaiva ācāryābhāve 'pi svayaṃ bodhicittotpādavidhiḥ- tathāgataśākyamuniṃ daśadiksarvatathāgatāṃśca manasā vicintya vandanā-pūjādividhiṃ ca kṛtvā adhyeṣaṇāsahitamācāryapadavirahitaśaraṇagamanādikramaṃ pūrvavad niṣpādayet
T04bsa040_u:26: / evaṃ utpannacittaḥ pudgalaḥ bodhicittavṛddhyartha antaśo divā trivāraṃ rātrau ca trivāraṃ-
T04bsa040_u:27: buddhaṃ ca dharmañca gaṇottamaṃ ca yāvaddhi bodhiṃ śaraṇaṃ gato 'smi /
T04bsa040_u:28: dānādikṛtyaiśca kṛtairmayaibhiḥ buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāya // 3 //
T04bsa040_u:31: katame catvāraḥ? gurudakṣiṇīyavisaṃvādanam, pareṣu akaukṛtyasthānīyeṣu kaukṛtyopādanam, utpannacittebhyo bodhisattvebhyo dveṣeṇa avarṇabhāṣaṇam, sarvasattveṣu māyāśāṭhyācaraṇañca /
T04bsa040_u:33: katamāṃścaturaḥ? jīvitasyāpi hetoḥ prajānan amṛṣāvādam, sarvasattveṣu adhyāśayaviśuddhyā sthitiḥ
T04bsa040_u:35: śāstṛsaṃjñāmutpādya daśasu dikṣu samyagguṇākhyānam, ye sattvāḥ kuśale
T04bsa040_u:36: sthāpitāḥ teṣām anuttarasamyaksambodhau sthāpanaṃ na tu śrāvakapratyekabuddhatveṣviti /
T04bsa040_u:40: tatra prathamaṃ vidhivad utpannabodhicittasya bodhisattvasya sarvabodhisattvaśīlaśikṣāṃ suśikṣitukāmanayā
T04bsa040_u:42: bodhisattvasaṃvarapradānena śiṣyānugrahasamartha kalyāṇamitraṃ namaskṛtya taccaraṇe nipatya adhyeṣaṇā- "ācārya! tavāhaṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamākāṃkṣāmyādātuṃ tadarhasyanuparodhena
T04bsa040_u:45: tvam evaṃ sattvān anuttīrṇān uttārya, amuktān
T04bsa040_u:47: buddhavaṃśānucchedam icchasi? tatastvaṃ cittotpādadārḍhya samādānadārḍhyañca kuru /
T04bsa040_u:50: tatpaścāt tathāgataśākyamuneḥ niṣiktāṃ pratimāṃ paṭacitram vā purato
T04bsa040_u:52: yathāśakti bāhyapañcapūjayā pūjāṃ vandanaṃ ca kuryāt /
T04bsa040_u:53: tadanantaraṃ kalyāṇamitram uccāsanasthitaṃ śāstṛsaṃjñayā namaskṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya utkuṭukāsanena vāpi kṛtāñjaliḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ bodhisattvasaṃvaragrahaṇāya evam adhyeṣayet-
T04bsa040_u:54: "ācāryo bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ me śīghraṃ dadātu" ityevaṃ trivāraṃ kalyāṇamitram adhyeṣeta /
T04bsa040_u:55: tataḥ kalyāṇamitra upaviṣṭa utthito vāpi saḥ bodhisattvasaṃvaragrāhakaṃ taṃ evaṃ paripṛcchet- "evaṃnāmā tvaṃ bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
T04bsa040_u:56: evaṃ pṛṣṭe sati tena grāhakabodhisattvenāpi āmeti pratijñātavyam" /
T04bsa040_u:57: tataḥ 'akṣayāprameyānuttarapuṇyamahānidhibhūtaḥ sarvabuddhaguṇaratnākaro bodhisattvasaṃvaro 'cireṇa adhigamyata' iti cintayan cittaprasādāt saharṣa tūṣṇībhūya kṛtāñjalistiṣṭhet /
T04bsa040_u:58: atha sa kalyāṇamitraḥ trikālasarvabodhisattvasarvaśikṣāpadāni sarvañca śīlaṃsaṃvaraśīlaṃ , kuśaladharmasaṅgrāhakaśīlaṃ, sattvārthakriyāśīlañca samāsataḥ śiṣyam ababodhya- "sarvabodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni tāni ca sarvabodhisattvaśīlāni kiṃ mattaḥ gṛhītukāmo 'si" evaṃ śiṣyaṃ pṛcchet /
T04bsa040_u:59: tasmin tathā "gṛhītukāmo 'smi" iti pratijñāte sati bodhisattvasaṃvaro dātavyaḥ /
T04bsa040_u:60: tvamevaṃnāmā bhadanta āyuṣmān kulaputro vā mat bodhisattva ityeva saṃjñakāt "sarvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ
T04bsa040_u:64: yāni śikṣāpadāni yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ sarvabodhisattvānāṃ bhavati
T04bsa040_u:70: "grahīṣyasi kiṃ" iti uktvā śiṣyeṇa "ām sugṛhīṣyāmi" iti trivāraṃ abhihite
T04bsa040_u:72: tataḥ sa kalyāṇamitraḥ śiṣyāya bodhisattvasaṃvaraṃ sattvā daśadiksarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ pañcāṅganamaskārapūrva kṛtāñjaliḥ evaṃ trivāraṃ vadet- "pratīgṛhītamanena evaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena mama evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikād yāvat trirapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
T04bsa040_u:75: viparokṣāṇāmapi sarvatra sarvasattvāviparokṣabuddhīnāṃ daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvārocayāmyasmin
T04bsa040_u:77: iti trivāraṃ daśadiksabuddhabodhisattvebhya uktvā, namaskṛtya ca guruśiṣyau uttiṣṭhetām
T04bsa040_u:78: tata utthāya kalyāṇamitraḥ bodhisattvasaṃvaragrāhakaṃ bodhisattvam evaṃ
T04bsa040_u:79: brūyāt- "evaṃnāma bodhisattva! tvaṃ śṛṇu- iyaṃ hi dharmatā /
T04bsa040_u:80: yadā bodhisattvena bodhisattvasaṃvarasamādānakarmavācanā parisampādyate tadā daśadiksarvabuddhakṣetreṣu buddhabodhisattveṣu etādṛṅnimittāni prādurbhavanti /
T04bsa040_u:81: te buddhabodhisattvā evaṃ kasmiṃścid buddhakṣetre evaṃnāmā bodhisattva evaṃnāmno bodhisattvād bodhisattvasaṃvarasamādānaṃ gṛhṇāti iti saṃjānanti" /
T04bsa040_u:82: ataḥ te bhagavanto buddhā te ca bodhisattvā dharmasnehāt putrān bhrātṛkāniva sandadhate /
T04bsa040_u:84: atha tena kalyāṇamitreṇa sa bodhisattva evaṃ vaktvyaḥ /
T04bsa040_u:89: bodhisattvasaṃvarapradarśane aśraddadhānā sattvāste bodhisattvasaṃvaraṃ aśraddhayā parityajanti
T04bsa040_u:90: ato yāvad bodhisattvo bodhisattvasaṃvarasthitaḥ puṇyarāśiyukto bhavati tāvad aśraddhayā sa tenaiva apuṇyarāśinā ca yukto bhavati /
T04bsa040_u:91: yato bodhisattvaḥ sattvān sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parirakṣati anyāṃśca pāpebhyo nivārayati /
T04bsa040_u:93: atha śikṣāpadapārājikasthānabhūtān saṃvaranāśahetūn darśayitvā duṣkṛtān kliṣṭākliṣṭān api darśayet /
T04bsa040_u:100: punastenaiva paṇḍitena lokacakṣuṣā bhikṣu-jayaśīlena (chul khrims rgyal va) ca saṃśodhya nirṇītaḥ //
